main event: Two very large, long objects were observed on 14 August 1957 in Woodland Hills, California.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be twice as large as a B-36 aircraft,The sighting lasted for 2-3 seconds,The objects appeared as one or two bright lights with dark space in between, They moved in a straight and level course during the observation, Four bright flashes were noted as the objects reached the west before disappearing.
sighted object: two very large, long objects appearing as bright lights
witness description: no witnesses confirmed in the report
